verbs.description: [ARG0: A large majority of Americans] [V: think] [ARG1: President Donald Trump tweets too much] , a new poll shows , and even more Republican voters are agreeing .
A large majority of Americans think President Donald Trump tweets too much , a new poll shows , and even more Republican voters [V: are] agreeing .
